reviews.review_msg: JV is awesome. This was by far my favorite class ever, and I'm a business student. He is very helpful, he cares about the students, he cares about the material and his lectures are interesting for the material he is going over. The field trip was EPIC. Oh and DO NOT buy the textbook, you don't need it at all, just go to lecture and read the slides.
Inapprochable and unhelpful. She favours few students.
